sec.p: The perturbation of radiative forcing from additional GHG concentrations is based on the equations in Table 8.SM.1 from IPCC AR5. CH 4 forcing is adjusted by a factor of 1.65 to account for effects on tropospheric ozone and stratospheric water vapor, as is standard in GWP calculations. N 2O forcing is adjusted by a factor of 0.928 to account for N 2O impacts on CH 4 concentrations, as is also standard in GWP calculations. Baseline radiative forcing is derived from the RCP scenario database.
